nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 30 is the thirtieth issue of the canon comic book anthology series Star Wars Adventures. It is comprised of the stories "Loyalty Test," by Michael Moreci, and "The Lost Stories, Part 1," by Cavan Scott. The issue was published on January 29, 2020 by IDW Publishing.
Explore the galaxy in light of events depicted in The Rise of Skywalker! In this issue, the spotlight falls on Kylo Ren!
